alert.note: Alert for Barron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 15 at 5:06AM CDT until July 15 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR CENTRAL BARRON COUNTY... At 506 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated rain continues across the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Law enforcement reports some flooding on Highway 8 in Barron. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rice Lake, Barron, Chetek, Cumberland, Cameron, Sumner, Barronett, Canton, Rice Lake Airport and Cumberland Airport. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
